page.title: DaimlerChrysler Operating Profit Rises
page.text: FRANKFURT (Reuters) - DaimlerChrysler's <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=DCXGn.DE target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">DCXGn.DE</A> third-quarter operating profit rose 7 percent, just below analyst expectations, as gains at U.S. arm Chrysler helped offset weaker earnings at premium carmaker Mercedes.
